Description:
IN/SPD240921/01-311927562

You have failed to ensure, so far as is reasonably practicable, that the construction site is organised in such a way that pedestrians and vehicles can move without risks to health or safety in that, you have not established pedestrian routes that provide safe access to work sites (including plots 52 - 55 and plots 64 - 66 in particular) and you have failed to establish crossing points where necessary, including where pedestrians cross areas on site where vehicles reverse.
